channel.title: How do I pack cache folders and sprites folders into a .JAR
channel.description: Please help me I would like to know how to pack cache folders and sprites folders into a .JAR. Because Right now I have a folder with my .JAR and my .Bat but it doesn't work without the cache/sprites/javazoom folder and picture, so how do i pack all that into that one .JAR?? Please help and thank you in advance.

item.title: How do I pack cache folders and sprites folders into a .JAR
item.dc:creator: @Peter787 Peter787
item.description:
@Peter787 wrote:

Oh IC, but does that mean I would have to extract files from folders and just put everything in a bunch?? Or How would I classify a folder?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2007, 08:44:35 PM[/size][hr]??[br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2007, 08:47:55 PM[/size][hr]I still need help, Can anyone post step by step instructions on how to make a .JAR with the included: cache/javazoon/sign/sprites? PLease thanks you.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 29, 2007, 06:48:07 AM[/size][hr]??

Read full topic
